certifications.title: APSSDC Django Web Development Internship Certificate

projects.name: Gold Mine Game Design
projects.description: Led project which aims to boost the efficiency of gold collecting by upto 75% using Q-learning methods. Created an intelligent ML agent that can dynamically update its strategies according to current status.

projects.name: Stock Price Analysis
projects.description: Done Exploratory Data Analysis on particular stock and used Plotly to visualize prices & other metrics. Optimize for performance, especially with large datasets reducing manual time consumption by 90%.

projects.name: Blood Bank Management System
projects.description: Developed a Blood Bank Management connecting SQL to HTML,CSS using php and JavaScript. Launched the application on an Apache XAMPP server with 0 errors and 90% donor satisfaction.

experiences.description: Created and customized applications using Apex, Visualforce, and Lightning Web Components. Visualised user-friendly interfaces resulting in a 25% increase in user satisfaction scores. Deployed 5 custom applications meeting user requirements and increasing operational efficiency by 15%.

Engaged in APSSDC Summer Workshop on Python Web Development using Django. Developed a 100% functional Hospital Management System with URLs, forms, MySQL integration. Reduced page load times by 55% through optimized database queries and caching mechanisms.
